rules_text:
Trample
[i]Sinmara[/i] – Surtr, King of Múspell can't be blocked except by three or more creatures.
[i]Glowing Ember[/i] – If a creature dealt damage by Surtr would die, exile it instead with an ember counter on it.
[i]Múspellflame[/i] – At the beginning of your end step, put target creature card in exile with a ember counter on it onto the battlefield under your control. That creature has gains menace.
